website_summaries.verdict: For those pajama wearers who seek the comfort and security of a button fly pant instead of a drawstring, this is the set to consider. The material is closer to flannel than satin, but is ideal for warm weather sleeping.
pros: Old School" button fly pajama style not easily found elsewhere
Comfortable summer weight for warmer climates
cons: Poly/cotton blend not as comfortable as satin or silk
Fabric is very thin, not durable over time

customer_reviews.title: You're going to love these.
customer_reviews.text: Loved my husband so much, I got my own. Would definitely buy these again. I wear size M in most womens clothes, I got these a size L so they would be loose. Perfect fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: Naje

customer_reviews.title: The Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: The reason I ordered these PJs by Hanes is because they seemed like normal, traditional PJs for men: matching top and bottom, button/snap bottoms, and a fully functional FLY. Some retailers seem to be "updating" their men's PJs to include mismatched tops and bottoms, side pockets in the bottoms (who needs pockets in PJs???), and girlie drawstring bottoms with NO FLY! That's why I am very happy that I found these traditional Hanes PJs for men and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Movie Maker (Wash, DC)

customer_reviews.title: I feel like Ward Cleaver!
customer_reviews.text: What more can you say about a 1960 style set of pajamas. They are light, comfortable, and easy to sleep in. I just wish they had pockets in the pants. And if you wife is younger than 40, don't expect her to like these cause my wife sure doesn't, lol She thinks I look like Ward Cleaver, the dad from Leave it to Beaver. I like wearing these when I want to be covered but not be to hot. I recommend these pajamas!
customer_reviews.author: Papabear

customer_reviews.title: sleep comfort
customer_reviews.text: I was a little puzzled by the description, "Woven" in the product write-up, but Hanes products are one of my favorites and I went ahead with the purchase. I'm glad I did ! Previous PJ"s made of tightly woven cotton cloth tended to be too warm. These are different. The weave is open and the fabric 'breaths" nicely. They are not warm under the covers and are literally, "No Sweat." The fit is comfortable and the colors subdued. The durability of the cloth remains to be tested. We wash daily, so it won't take long to find out, if the fabric holds up with use.
customer_reviews.author: George Anast

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These turned out to be a really great pair of pajamas. I got the large because I'm kind of fat. But I'm also kind of short. So I expected the legs to be very long by buying the large-sized, but that is not the case. Quality seems reasonable enough and the buttons going to the buttonholes very easy. No problems, five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoniac

customer_reviews.title: Poor in more ways than I care to elaborate on!
customer_reviews.text: This pair of p.j.s was sent to me and it must have been sitting in the warehouse for years! The labels that were attached to the material left an indelible mark from the glue that attached the labels to the front of the shirt. It was impossible to remove. Besides that, the material is very cheap and thin, also too small for what it should have been (not sized right). Overall, I would not even rate this one star! The warehouse should have cleaned out their stock and not shipped it in the first place. But there is no excuse for the poor, second rate quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Inky

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, light fabric, darker color than what it is shown.
customer_reviews.text: I got the large and it fits perfectly (I am 36 waist, 5' 11", and weight 195). I will be wearing this when at home, with no visitors, and in South Florida, so the lightweight fabric is perfect. Now, the fabric also appears to be not of the best quality. Time will tell. The color is certainly not what it is shown in the picture, what I received is more towards the dark blue than to the light blue color. Still, I can live with it. It feels very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo

customer_reviews.title: Stained and torn upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: I'm truly appalled by the state these pajamas were in. As you can see from the pictures, straight out of the package, there were what appear to be blood stains on the right sleeve of the shirt and a visible hole in the pants. Beyond that they were severely wrinkled, which just makes it seem even more like zero care was put into quality control. This is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice PJ's
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why, but I have to order Hane's Woven-Plain Weave in the XL in order to get a good fit for my 36" waist. Hane's sizing chart recommends ordering an L for 36-38" waist. For me, they're too tight, especially after eating. So I have to order the X-L that is recommended for a 40-42" waist. Simply put. I have to order the next bigger size to get a good fit for my waist. I've noticed in other reviews that people are having no problem with Hane's sixzing chart so it just might be me.
customer_reviews.author: PurpleHeartLane

customer_reviews.title: Nice pajamas
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these! I bought him a XXL as he wears a 42-44 pants and they fit nice, he said theyre comfortable, not heavy and they wash nicely in cool water, low heat dryer. No shrinkage and get softer when washed. He's 5'10 with 30" inseam and the length is just a tiny bit too long. I also bought another brand,, both fit, wear and wash alike! All in all, a good value, well made pajamas.
customer_reviews.author: JanisW

customer_reviews.title: Good Pajamas
customer_reviews.text: Three of the stars I gave these pajamas are for quality: At no point will the wearer think, "Wow! These are amazing and must have cost hundreds!" At the same time, the wearer will never think, "Boy, I should have invested more in a quality set of pajamas." As a stand-alone garment set, these are of average, Target Store level quality. BUT, the fourth star is for comfort in bed. It turns out that the mediocre fabric vents very well, and for those who tend to run warm, these pajamas will not end up on the floor before morning.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mott

customer_reviews.title: Mostly OK if you are rather tall
customer_reviews.text: I am average height and weight, and still a Medium has too long sleeves and legs and is a bit baggy. It is disappointing that the product description does not have sleeve length and pant inseam specifications. So I will have to pay for some tailoring. The material is open-weaved, and a bit stiff and scratchy. It feels like there is some kind of sizing in/on the material which did not wash away with hot water and soap. Maybe this will change over time. The buttons are sewn-on very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: M. Loftus

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these pajamas based on price and positive reviews. Unfortunately they are NOT comfortable, in fact the fabric is very rigid, like a new pair of jeans, and they keep your body rather warm. Which isn't great during these warm summer nights, I suppose I'll store it away until winter. I have a big barrel shaped body, so the shirt was rather tight along my shoulders and chest, loose around the stomach, alright size, but I had no use for the pants as the waist was absurdly large! I'm a big guy, but not gargantuan! Cheap pajamas, what is there to expect?
customer_reviews.author: Dobees#1

customer_reviews.title: The printed pattern of the PJ's I received is not the same as what I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: The printed pattern of the PJ's I received is not the same as what I ordered from the web page.......... similar but certainly not the same.
customer_reviews.author: geologyjohn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for summer,
customer_reviews.text: Just what my husband was looking for. He is picky about the fabric of his pajamas and even though they say they are a certain fabric they do actually ‘feel’ diffferent. Some have a heavier feel to them. We live in Florida and he prefers a lighter weight pajama. These worked. Let me know when you get a couple more colors in Medium!
customer_reviews.author: Cra

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive pajamas
customer_reviews.text: I love my new pajamas. They are very comfortable they fit beautifully and I am very tempted to buy another pair. I am 6'5 and 220 lb I bought an extra large and they are comfortable and fit me just right. Just as importantly they are about half the price of the other pajamas that I saw available.
customer_reviews.author: Deb C.

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you're looking for
customer_reviews.text: These are the ones. Very smooth hand, super lightweight, it feels almost like wearing air because it doesn't cling, if that makes sense. Bought these and the matching robe. The robe is well worth the money. I bought it for travel. Amazing. Same fabric. These are more expensive than other brands, but the hand of them and the smoothness of the weave of the fabric is worth it. Wonderful, traditional pajamas. Makes me wonder why we ever went to wearing knits because these are so much more comfy. Oh, and they dry fast. Great for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Dodie's Doodles

customer_reviews.title: Beware the sizing in the top part
customer_reviews.text: I like the cloth material, the design, and the fit. The one thing I did not like, and would not have made this purchase if I had known, was the sizing material used in the top half. The sizing is a paper product and it appears to be the same as the sizing I had in a couple of other pajamas. It does not hold up well when washed, and when it starts coming apart, it is a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel W. Autrey

customer_reviews.title: If you wear L buy M..Price needs to lower.
customer_reviews.text: If you wear L buy M. I have tried washing it in dryer and washing in laundromat. This is a great product. It had been tested in all types of machine and the color and quality have survived for more then 2 months now. So i guess it will last long. So don't worry just buy it. Its nice to wear it during sleep. Its very comfortable. Just the price is a bit high lower it so that clients can have lots of this sleep wear.
customer_reviews.author: IQ

customer_reviews.title: Nice, comfortable PJs
customer_reviews.text: For me, these PJs are a perfect fit. That said, I ordered Large and I am 5-9/180. The weight of the fabric is just right, not too light, and not too heavy. Bottoms have button closings, not a draw string, so there is less adjustment, just an elastic waist band. The came set on the looser button hole, which is a perfect fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: W. J. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: I lost weight recently and my PJs were too large - so I tried this. Inexpensive, a nice blue color, soft enough for comfortable sleeping, and fits quite well. It's not high end, but I knew that going in. I'm going to see if it holds up washing well enough, and if it does then I might get a few more. I don't think I'd need anything of much higher quality to be honest. It's fine as is.
customer_reviews.author: e-dolecki

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but a little stiff
customer_reviews.text: The only real complaint with the pajamas are that the fabric, even with washings, is a little stiff, but is still comfortable to wear at night. It is breathable and doesn't contort or pinch in any way. As for wearing while awake, it is comfortable and relaxing, and thick enough to feel like you are wearing "real" clothing when sitting on furniture. As a female buying "men's" pajamas, there is this: I have a small waist, so my only additional complaint is that I would like to be able to take it in more at the waistline (they have buttons to make it a little tighter, but not too much).
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Please be aware
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these pajamas for my husband. I laundered them in Free and Clear laundry detergent which I have used for a while. He put them on last night and within an hour he broke out every place the pajamas touched him from his neck down. We ended up in the ER where he was put on IV steroids. I just want to warn others to proceed with caution.
customer_reviews.author: Jane W.

customer_reviews.title: A pretty good pajama set
customer_reviews.text: This pajama set is very comfortable and seems to be somewhat durable. it's very hard to find pajamas that fit me well, im 5'5 and everything i buy always is TOO LONG. these pajamas XL are no exception. the legs drag the ground sliightly and are a little baggy, the shirt portion is cut nice but stiil runs a little small. im 5'5 and 220 pounds just for reference, and i got the XL size. All in all im happy. it's had to shop for clothes and pajamas etc online because every brand is cut differently. will update as time goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunatelly, the Pajama was not a "Medium" as had ordered.It came as an X-large.When I opened the package I thought it was a little big, but, I did not pay close attention and washed the Pajama.This one is much too big. We like the quality but he cannot wear it now. Please advise.Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Helga Cihlar

customer_reviews.title: I really like these PJs; made of a soft, comfortable, cool fabric; are of appropriate size and fit well; wash & dry well, etc.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these PJs; so far I have purchased two pair XX-L which fit well and may order more. They are made of a soft, comfortable, cool fabric; are of appropriate size and fit well; they hold up well after several washer and dryer encounters; the buttons and button holes are well-sewn and properly placed; and they have an over-all manly yet snazzy look for lounging around the house in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: SocraticMethod

customer_reviews.title: These are NOT soft. I wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: I have some cotton men’s pjs that are so soft and comfy— these are NOT. I’ve washed them over and over again and cannot get them to lose the “scratchy” feeling. If you’re looking for pjs to be comfy in , don’t get these unless you like scratchy material. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Rummel

customer_reviews.title: Great pajamas
customer_reviews.text: I love these pajamas. I have purchased these before at the store but just finding pajamas in itself is hard to do. The stores just don't seem to carry them very much. Be careful on the right size though. I take a large and I am not that big. I am 5' 9" and 155 lbs. Normally I would buy a medium but on pajamas I am a large size. Go figure............
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable cloths. Fits well
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable cloths. Fits well. I bought for my grandfather who is 5'10" and 150 pounds. He bought size large and they are slightly big. We purposely bought them a little big BC he had surgery on his shoulder and we needed to be able to get them on and off him easily. He liked this red plaid pattern as well as the dark blue plaid we also bought.
customer_reviews.author: TMixon

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, the quality is poor
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in these pajamas. The workmanship is very poor. The eyelets--if that's what you call them--that the buttons go into on the pajama top are not well finished. One of them is basically just a cut in the fabric. Worst piece of clothing I've ever bought and the last one I buy from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Hal Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Unable to gift this set because packaging adhesive was stuck to shirt front
customer_reviews.text: I was very glad I opened the packaging to check the fit before we gifted the set to my dad. Adhesive from the cardboard sleeve encircling the folded pajama gift set had adhered to the front of the shirt. There may have been a method to remove it from both the fabric and one of the front buttons it was on without hurting the shirt fabric or buttonhole threads, but I didn't want to chance it. All I know is I couldn't easily pick it off.
customer_reviews.author: L.E.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and light-weight, soft material
customer_reviews.text: Great pajamas at a reasonable price. The plaid is a classic design and the material soft. They wash well (on warm) and didn’t shrink. The size runs as expected. I would buy again! I had a hard time finding classically-styled pajamas for my husband before I came across these. Perfect weight for summertime!
customer_reviews.author: Bargain shopper

customer_reviews.title: not strictly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I have not bought Hanes for a long time. These pajamas are well made. They are sized well. You have to wash them before wearing them. The arms and legs were a little long. But after washing the fit is good. They were advertised as flannel. They are cotton that is true. abut they are not flannel. They are light and comfortable. They should not be advertised as flannel.
customer_reviews.author: david c burnett

customer_reviews.title: XL bottoms are not longer in length.
customer_reviews.text: These are made only for vertically challenged individuals. I ordered XL and I would have to sag the pants below my butt to make them barely reach my feet. And they were wide enough to fit 3 of me inside of them. 6'3 height. I comfortably wear XL pajamas bottoms from Old Navy.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: I'm 6'3" and could use a "tall" fit as the ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'3" and could use a "tall" fit as the legs are a little short for me. But they are just pajamas and I won't be wearing them to Wal-Mart etc..... :-) Revising rating from five to one. Less than 3 months old and the inseam on the bottoms is coming apart in two places. Poor workmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Gulfbreezer

customer_reviews.title: Just basic pajamas
customer_reviews.text: Just bought these to see if I would like wearing pajamas as I near senior citizenship, and the conclusion is: I don't. But that's not the fault of this item. Fine materials and workmanship, nothing wrong here, though nothing exceptionally good either. Just your regular old-school PJ's.
customer_reviews.author: Teh Arbitrageur

customer_reviews.title: These were vey much appreciated..
customer_reviews.text: These PJs were part of a gift for my 93 year-old father-in-law. He spends ALOT of time in bed. He was very pleased to receive these. Also, the price was quite nice (a good thing for me).
customer_reviews.author: Pink Lady

customer_reviews.title: Badly designed.
customer_reviews.text: The shirt is tight across the shoulders when making any number of normal movements. Never had this problem with a shirt before and makes the shirt portion unusable for me. The pants are pretty comfy and fit well, however it also seems to have lesser than spectacular range of movement.
customer_reviews.author: Glorysaber

customer_reviews.title: The top fit fine for the size large but the bottom was to ...
customer_reviews.text: first of all after unwrapping package I had to get the scissors and cut off all the strings of thread and there were a LOT of them. Apparently the finisher missed this pair. The top fit fine for the size large but the bottom was to small around the waist. Another Goodwill drop off. If I hadn't washed them I would of returned. No more Hanes for us!!
customer_reviews.author: Jolemie

customer_reviews.title: Most uncomfortable, poor quality pajamas I never thought could possibly exist.
customer_reviews.text: The pants are fine, except they're connected in the front at the waistline by nothing but a button. The shirts. Holy crap the shirts. You want to sleep in those? They pull constantly at every move while you sleep! There is NOTHING comfortable about them. Any movement shows the cut/style inadequate for the range of motion of the human body. There's a reason they're so cheap, I guess. I can't sleep with the shirts on at all. Wake up 5-8 times a night. It's awful. DO NOT RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Loren K.

customer_reviews.title: Men's PJs
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry to say that these PJs are not so great. I got them for my husband for his Bday because it's what he wanted but when we opened the package, the smell was horrendous! It was quite embarrassing. I washed them and rinsed them twice and after I dried them, I could still smell it. I guess it was the packaging. You may consider changing the type plastic you use. It was very strong and awful. The only other thing is the fabric is not soft. I like the style and fit but the fabric was stiff and not cozy. These type jammies are hard to find but I wish they had been softer and not stinky.
customer_reviews.author: Little Dove

customer_reviews.title: Not a true medium size pajama set.
customer_reviews.text: My dude always wears medium sizes but this medium was weirdly sized in the upper arms and upper back (too tight and constricting, with no “give”). If he had exchanged for a large it would’ve been too big in other places. So we had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice men’s pajamas. Generously cut, nice and loose. Comfy material, soft on the skin. Bottoms don’t have pockets, top has a pocket. Wash and wear , no special laundering requirements. Shrank very little. These are an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for cool weather
customer_reviews.text: I bought these hoping they would sleep cool. They don't really, for me anyway. They feel like a thin flannel. In cooler weather they'll be great, but in the hot humid weather now they're too warm. I'm 6' about 190, the large fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: rjones35

customer_reviews.title: Pajama shirt not sewn correctly!
customer_reviews.text: The pajama bottoms fit perfectly. The pajama top was defective as it was sewn under arms incorrectly and hindered movement of arms. I had to return this purchase to Amazon for a full refund. I would not recommend purchase of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Diane H.

customer_reviews.title: Sleeve needed repair after first washing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two pair for my husband. After the first washing, a sleeve on the one pair needed to be sewn shut. It had about a two inch gap where it wasn't together. Since I was having a relative hem them up for me anyway, I will have her repair the sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Herestoyou

customer_reviews.title: Soft jammas
customer_reviews.text: I am 510/ 220 I purchased the xl so I would have room. They are roomy and I'm sure once washed will shrink some and that's expected. I could have purchased a large and they would of fit perfectly. The xl isn't extremely bigger,but bigger.I like the oversize. They are soft and really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Docc docc

customer_reviews.title: Great set of pajamas
customer_reviews.text: I have several Hanes pajama sets. When one of them had thinned out and was beginning to tear, I ordered the blue set, size Medium. It fits really well. I am 5'9" around 150 lb of average build. Both the top and bottom fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Manoj Shanker

customer_reviews.title: Outrageous!
customer_reviews.text: The pajamas are a return. They came crumpled into a ball and stuffed inside a plain clear plastic bag. No tags, and very wrinkled. I bought them for a birthday gift, and haven't time to buy another pair. This is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A

customer_reviews.title: Great for surgery patients!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit for my husband! He had OHS surgery and these PJs were super comfy and not too hot like the flannel ones are. The pants were a tad on the larger size but seemed to fit better once washed and dried.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good pyjanas, but
customer_reviews.text: The “ medium” size is a bit smaler than expected which results in a poor but barely acceptable fit. if you are a ful small or medium I suggest getting one step large. Other than that they a vry nice.
customer_reviews.author: Richard F. Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Good to look at. Nothing else.
customer_reviews.text: These are a gorgeous red and look good. But they're incredibly thin and will do nothing for winter. Spring, maybe, summer yes. Those little lint ball things we all hate happen very quickly with these. I would probably not purchase these again. For something short term (vacation, photo shoot, a one night stand, etc) they'll do fine.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Devine

customer_reviews.title: Like them!
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat large for me. But they'll be fine for sleeping. Medium would have been too snug. Appear to be well made. Washed them in warm and they have a soft feel. I'm satisfied. Steam ironed the collar for smoothness.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent E. Morton

customer_reviews.title: The pajama game?
customer_reviews.text: By all appearances this is a well made product. Frankly, I don't like the color (red plaid) but that was all that was available and therefore I bought it. The material was nicely sewn with the exception of several long pieces of thread that hadn't been trimmed. A scissor took care of this. The material is typical of light weight pajamas and looks as though it will last a season or two. I'm basically pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Panhard

customer_reviews.title: Not what was expected
customer_reviews.text: The sizing is difficult to get right. For me the v-neck goes too low before the first button. It is not that comfortable. Having the second button hole at the waist is good as it make the waist size eaiser to adjust. I wear and extra-large in most t-shirt, shirts, but need a medium with this product.
customer_reviews.author: TD Newman

customer_reviews.title: Light pj for summer nights.
customer_reviews.text: Light fabric for summer nights and well made. Nice color of light blue. I am 6' and 175lb, and feel that the top should be a bit bigger. Anyone heavier around the middle or with bigger shoulders should look elsewhere. Bottoms are good length for a 6 footer.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S

customer_reviews.title: Thin fabric.
customer_reviews.text: This fabric was pretty thin and stiff. I guess I was hoping for that "cotton" feel, but did not get it. This product will cover you, but will not keep you warm. However, it did not state that it would.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Roller

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Well Made Pajama
customer_reviews.text: The pajama is very comfortable to wear. I wear it over my T-shirts to prevent them from getting wine stains. FYI, I normally wear a men's size medium. However, I had to order a men's size large for the pajama to fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: J Hunter

customer_reviews.title: I wish it was the kind of fabric you would want to sleep in
customer_reviews.text: The size and price was great but it is a thin, taunt fabric. I was very careful wearing it to a pajama party for fear it would rip. I don't think I will be wearing them again.
customer_reviews.author: avid reader

customer_reviews.title: He loved them specially how light they are and the way ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband was having back surgery so I got him these PJ. He loved them specially how light they are and the way they button makes it easy on the back. Unfortunately the leg seam was done incorrectly and came apart. Can't send them back at the moment due to he is very comfortable and easy to get on and off. Again great PJ just a error in sewing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my father for Christmas. But he passed away before then. I had them to put them on him because he was a pajama guy and was cremated. Sad but so happy he got to wear them. Thank you for the great quality of merchandise.
customer_reviews.author: susan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Fit is good
customer_reviews.text: It's great. My only comment is the top is a bit long for me, more like a nigh shirt... Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Marconi

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for sleeping and lounging
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived as quickly as was promised, was easy to get out of its packaging, was easily buttoned, fit well and is very comfortable for sleeping and just lounging around. Can't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: VirginiaHoosier

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Lovely, well made PJs. Purchased for my Dad. The fabric is more substantial than that found in stores. They wash and dry well. Only issue is the collar lapel becomes quite wrinkled. I tacked both sides with a stitch which did help.
customer_reviews.author: Lenell

customer_reviews.title: Honest review
customer_reviews.text: very short pants for XL size!! if you are tall, this won't fit you! this is made for short guys!
customer_reviews.author: FR

customer_reviews.title: Great PJs
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these for some time now from K-Mart but the K-Mart in our area just went out of business. They are soft and comfortable. I am glad I could find them on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Yonatan

customer_reviews.title: Barely adequate, cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. No loops on either top or bottom to hang on a hook. Top button is set too far down on chest to keep upper chest warm on a cold night. There should be a button at the top, but there isn't. The PJs I was sent are dark, not like the light blue color in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Green Hornet

customer_reviews.title: Can't button the waist
customer_reviews.text: The top and length of these pajamas fit, but the waistband was very small. The buttonholes were small as well, but that was overcome with a little snip, however buttoning them was a near impossibility. The fabric, while woven, seemed to be slightly brushed as if it were attempting to appear as flannel. They were ordered in size large which usually provides extra room for the person for whom they were ordered. Not this time.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Claire

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my husband. He loves them. They have plenty of room to be comfortable, and he looks so nice when wearing them to bed. Didn't know I was going to turn him into a sleeping beauty. LOL. We ordered additional pairs. They have all arrived on time, fit great, and there has been no bad surprises after washing several times. It is hard to find the xx-large in the stores so I am grateful for amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Austin girl

customer_reviews.title: Fitment is good, texture is fine
customer_reviews.text: You will get your money's worth. Mine fit perfectly and it feels good. I was going to get something more like flannel but I tend to sleep warm and don't need it. My only complaint which is minor, you need to read the directions and wash this first by itself because it bleeds the color easily. No shrinkage noted, just wash it first or you will turn that color.
customer_reviews.author: James Haight

customer_reviews.title: Good fit.
customer_reviews.text: Fit well. Had to sew up a loose seam on both of the cuffs. Material (a blend) is lightweight but unexpectedly too warm for our summers. Good for Fall and Winter.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Wash only in cold water
customer_reviews.text: The product shrinks a lot if washed in warm or hot water. Wash in cold water only. Wrinkles a lot too. Needs ironing if you care about looks.
customer_reviews.author: William L. Bowman Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Tailored lightweight PJ’s
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fit and feel. Lightweight and perfect as a summer PJ. Got as gift for Dad and he really likes the fit and colors. We got the black stripe.
customer_reviews.author: Skylar's Mom

customer_reviews.title: How to be comfortable in Pajamas
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted and arrived very promptly. Glad to recommend the pajamas to others.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Tindall

customer_reviews.title: Very nice jameees!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my dad and looks like I am going to have to get him a few more sets. He really likes them and tells me they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Pajamas are back in style.  Join the pajama party !!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, feels very, very, nice. I think I just converted to the 7 p.m.pajama lifestyle and LOVE it. Hey, don't knock it til you try it and these Hanes are the way. Slippers, robe, yep. I'm good.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: low quality
customer_reviews.text: My main objection is the lack of a drawstring, but the quality of workmanship is also low. Buttons are poorly attached, and there are threads sticking out of every buttonhole. The elastic waistband is insubstantial. These pajamas are, on the other hand, inexpensive, and I like the lightness of the fabric and the color.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas D. Stimson

customer_reviews.title: Order the size you wear.
customer_reviews.text: The reason these pajamas are too large is my fault. I wear a x-large but because I was going to sleep in them I wanted larger not smaller so I ordered xx-large. When I order again I'll order the size I wear. The pajamas are lightweight and seem well made for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Great pajamas
customer_reviews.text: The pajamas look great and fit as expected. I ordered two pair and have put them through several washings and they have held up very well. The only slight issue was that one set the shirt had a blemish it looks like it may have been resewn where the material had been separated but it's hardly noticeable. I will say it is a good bargain if looking for pajamas that are comfortable and look pretty good as well.
customer_reviews.author: gcompc

customer_reviews.title: Ok PJs but short arm length
customer_reviews.text: The material is light and roomy. The problem I had was with the length of the arms; they were short so I found it aggravating. Otherwise a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Careful of the size cause not as you see in picture
customer_reviews.text: Liked the material but had to take it to tailor to make it fit and that cost me some more money .
customer_reviews.author: HAMAD A.

customer_reviews.title: Size Chart either is wrong or labeling was not right.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered XL size and Got XL labeled pajamas that measured like they were 2 XL per their sizing chart. As this was an international order, it was just too costly to return for exchange. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Rodger D.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product. Haynes are the best!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought he would need the X large but I think I should have ordered the large. This is an awesome product.He has only opened & worm the one pair as he was in the hospital. They all 3 were supposed to be a Christmas gift and when I saw how the one I gave him for, I decided to wait for Christmas and then serif we could perhaps exchange those 2 for a large.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Monigold

customer_reviews.title: Good quality material.
customer_reviews.text: These men's pajamas have a generous fit to them and my husband finds them very comfortable. They wash and dry without too many wrinkles and do not shrink.
customer_reviews.author: Jammy

customer_reviews.title: Too big, and the black striped one looks like a prison uniform
customer_reviews.text: I wore this once but didn't like the way it fits or looks. I am 6' 2", 220 lbs and bought the XXL, maybe I should have bought XL.
customer_reviews.author: Stan G.

customer_reviews.title: May need altering....
customer_reviews.text: The small is rather large if you are 5’6 tall and average built. I had to have it altered but it’s a ok pajama. Definitely don’t buy the blue, the red one is better looking.
customer_reviews.author: Anderson Dasilva

customer_reviews.title: Nice light weight product
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, as it does not make you get too hot in bed, and is comfortable. What I do not like, it does not have side pants pockets, which is a major down for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lee S

customer_reviews.title: Soft men's pajamas
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as part of a gift for my husband. I ordered a large and they are somewhat big on him. He typical wears a large or extra large T-shirt and size 36 in waist pant. The material is very soft, thinner flannel, and true to the color pictured. When he put them on he said it reminded him of the pajamas worn by macaulay culkin in the holiday classic Home Alone.
customer_reviews.author: Chemlady123

customer_reviews.title: Great summer PJs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect summer PJ: light weight but non-transparent, looks good right out of the drier. Seems likely to last a long time. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: pizzymcgith

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, looks nice, light weight and very soft.
customer_reviews.text: My husband PJ’s are light weight, comfortable and very soft. He wanted a red pair for Christmas and now he wear them more than any of the others that he owns. I will purchase him another set but in a different color. Lucy AB
customer_reviews.author: Lucy AB

customer_reviews.title: Too Small; Is Not X-Large As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they were advertised as being X-Large which is what I take. They were too tight around the waist so I could not wear them. The material felt soft and smooth and nice, but the fit was all off. I think that X-Large means different things to different companies, so some X-Larges are smaller than other X-Larges, depending on what company made them. This product was not right for me.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Jammies
customer_reviews.text: So I got these for father's day and yes, dad loved them. He called and told me they fit well and are soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: my dad said they fit good and he liked them
customer_reviews.text: my dad said they fit good and he liked them. he is 94 and about 155 lbs and 5'9. can't remember either sleeves or legs a bit long but ok....better long than too short.ordered large.
customer_reviews.author: grasshopper

customer_reviews.title: ... brand my grandfather will wear BC they are so comfortable. These did not let us down
customer_reviews.text: Hanes is the only brand my grandfather will wear BC they are so comfortable. These did not let us down! I ordered these for him to wear after having shoulder surgery. We bought several styles and he wears them to sleep in and to lounge around the house the rest of the time.
customer_reviews.author: TMixon

customer_reviews.title: Pants need a draw string
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable, but the pants are slightly too large. A draw string would make these perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Cass

customer_reviews.title: A bit tight on the upper arms
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable pajamas and they look good. The only irritation that I noticed is that when I turn over at night they tend to pinch a bit in the upper arm area.
customer_reviews.author: Rod T

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good price
customer_reviews.text: It is really hard to find good mens' summer pajamas in retail stores. Selection is very limited if they even carry anything decent. This was the right answer.
customer_reviews.author: B-47 Gus

customer_reviews.title: Husband Loves these!!!
customer_reviews.text: The color is great. The quality of very good. The medium/light fabric is just what I was looking for, as my husband old favorite jammies that were wearing out were thin, these weren't too much of a change for him. He didn't care for a medium heavy weight pair I had gotten a few years ago. After buying this pair, he requested I get another, so I bought the red. Also great fabric. Nice deep red plaid. Very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Thrash

customer_reviews.title: Great guft
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my dad. It fits him well and it's made of Nice cotton fabric . Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: S.T.

customer_reviews.title: true to size
customer_reviews.text: Pajamas are true to size. Very light weight, thin and cooler for the summer. Overall, pleased with the pj's! 😁
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee Knowles
